about_the_game:
Mahjong on the background of the rising sun! Soft and delicate morning colors, the city and the countryside in a bluish haze, glistening dew drops on the leaves of trees..... All this and fascinating levels-puzzles in the mahjong genre are waiting for you in this game!

You will find more than 100 mahjong game layouts! Starting from simple and classic to exquisite themed ones. Go through 6 game locations, each of which is full of amazing puzzles. Multi-layered levels and huge layouts of 200 chips! This is what you have been looking for a long time!

- Collect gold chips to complete levels and open the next location
- Capture bonus chips and get extra coins and bonuses
- combo multiplier to increase coins
- 6 locations
- 120 levels
- 2 game difficulty modes
